name: Pigeon (Thbop)
description:
Welcome to Pigeon, a simple, Flappybird-inspired adventure! This game was made using Pygame.

Contains:

  • 4 distinct and minimalistic levels
  • Flap and Turbo Drop mechanics

Controls (also listed in included text file):

  • Space, W, Up Arrow, or Left Mouse Click to Flap
  • Shift, S, Down Arrow, or Right Mouse Hold to Turbo Drop

Please enjoy!
